title: Home Bargains is selling a glittery snow fairy gin in time for Christmas
text:

For many of us, it's never too early to get in the Christmas spirit.

And, with nine weeks to go, shoppers can get their hands on a shimmering snow fairy gin liqueur at Home Bargains.

The discount store is selling the bottle of clear booze in stores nationwide from November 4 - and we reckon this is going to be a hit with customers.

Made by Manchester Drinks, the festive tipple turns glittery and shimmers when it is shaken, stirred or poured and has an alcohol by volume (ABV) content of 18.7%.

If you thought nothing could taste more Christmassy than mulled wine, then you’re in for a festive surprise.

(Image: Publicity Picture)

This fairy-inspired gin liqueur combines flavours of cinnamon, spice and orange to get you in the holiday spirit.

It's also quite affordable too, setting you back just £8 for a 50cl bottle.

We'd advise getting a bottle soon as this glittery tipple will only be sold until the end of the year.

Find your nearest Home Bargains branch using the store locator online.

If you're looking for more glittery gin, Sainsbury's is selling a shimmering chocolate orange gin this Christmas.

Asda has also launched a festive gin range for the holiday season and it includes a mince pie flavour

Browse our roundup of the best gins for 2019 including brands Hendricks, Bombay Sapphire and Jawbox.
description: A gin that shimmers when you shake it is launching at Home Bargains on November 4th
